summary: Two gay teenagers go on the run after witnessing a murder.
cast: Emile Charles|Tony Forsyth|Robert Stephens|Clare Higgins|Bruce Payne|Robbie Coltrane|Carsten Norgaard|Kim Christie|Louis Emerick|Joseph Carrington|Julie Graham|Paula Ann Bland|Niven Boyd|Claire Parker|Caroline Milmoe|Forbes Collins|Malcolm Frederick|Albie Woodington|James McMartin|Paul Netterfield|Jason Conliffe|Mark Birch|Anton Brookes|Mandy Walsh|David Baukham|Liz Stooke|Bill Hufsey
title: The Fruit Machine
